abstract: Watching the series with my daughter had become a bonding ritual. But no more.
snippet: Watching the series with my daughter had become a bonding ritual. But no more.
lead_paragraph: Anderson Cooper invited some of the stars and their mothers of the TLC reality series "Toddlers & Tiaras" onto his daytime talk show yesterday. If you missed the broadcast and are, as I've been, quasi-obsessed with "T&T," you can catch a few riveting scenes on his Web site.

headline.main: Giving Up the Guilty Pleasure of 'Toddlers & Tiaras'
